articles.content: Xiaomi 14 series, the company's highly-anticipated successor to the Xiaomi 13 series phones, is reportedly gearing up for a launch soon. And this time around, the phone may debut with the next-gen Sn… [+1801 chars]

articles.author: Shibani Gharat
articles.title: Storyboard18 | Asian Paints prepares to embrace festive season celebrations - CNBCTV18
articles.description: In an exclusive interview, Asian Paints' MD & CEO, Amit Syngle unveiled the company's strategy for boosting ad spending during the festive season. He also discussed the impact on their business of new entrants in the decorative paints market.

articles.author: Sibu Tripathi
articles.title: When India intentionally crashed a spacecraft on Moon - India Today
articles.description: Chandrayaan-2 was not the first to crash on the Moon, India did that over a decade before Chandrayaan-2 was even launched. And that too, intentionally.
